===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きばせん}}

# a Japanese [[game]]: one person "rides" on top of a group of supporters while wearing a hat or flag, which the person tries to defend, while their team attempts to grab the opposing team's hat or flag. Compare {{m|en|chicken fight}}.
